issue.title: [C++] Store generated Flight protocol buffer headers in src/generated
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15624](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15624). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We strive to store all generated header files (by the Thrift or Flatbuffers compilers, for example) in `src/generated`. However, it seems that Flight puts its protocol buffers generated files in `<CMake build dir>/src/arrow/flight` and `<CMake build dir>/src/arrow/flight/sql`.

It would be nice to eventually harmonize this.
